datum_kwargs_list.description: Array of arguments to pass to the Handler to retrieve one quanta of data

resource.description: UID of the Resource to which all these Datum documents belong

datum_ids.description: Globally unique identifiers for each Datum (akin to 'uid' for other Document types), typically formatted as '<resource>/<integer>'

title: bulk_datum
description: Document to reference a quanta of externally-stored data
